items.title: Cathie Wood Is Buying This Top E-Commerce Stock That's Down 36%, and She Won't Stop Selling Palantir.
items.description: Shopify has many growth levers, including serving more types of businesses and expanding internationally.  Palantir is making high-priced deals that will boost revenue for years.  Following money manager Cathie Wood's stock trades can be an entertaining activity for the individual investor, and it can also provide some inspiration.

items.title: My 3 Favorite Stocks to Buy Right Now
items.description: AI is an important driver of Amazon's business.  JAKKS Pacific is an under-the-radar toy stock.  With the U.S.-China trade tensions easing, now could be a great time to add some consumer goods companies to your portfolio.

items.title: 5 Supercharged Growth Stocks I Bought During Last Month's Stock Market Crash
items.description: Market downturns represent an excellent opportunity to buy quality stocks at discounted prices.

items.title: 1 Monster Stock to Hold for the Next 5 Years
items.description: Despite the company’s already massive size, investors should still be able to achieve solid returns going forward.  Here's why this monster stock is a smart buy right now to hold for the next five years.  There's no question that investors have heard of e-commerce juggernaut Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN).

items.title: AI Daily: Nvidia says not sending GPU designs to China
items.description: Catch up on the top artificial intelligence news and commentary by Wall Street analysts on publicly traded companies in the space with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: NO GPU DESIGNS TO CHINA: Nvidia (NVDA) says it isn’t sending GPU plans to China following a report that the AI chipmaker is working on a research and development center in Shanghai, CNBC’s Samantha Subin reports.
